page.title: Trade Services
page.tab:
Hong Leong Bank Trade Services, with its worldwide network of agent banks, has the capability to fulfil your needs to reach the global market.

At Hong Leong Bank Trade Services, we are your partners in fulfilling your needs whether it is to finance your trade or to expand it. We can offer advice on a wide range of trade products to assist your trade activities.

As one of the leading banks in Malaysia, and now Cambodia, we are a relationship-driven bank with good trade finance experience and expertise. We have extensive geographical coverage in other countries, including China, Singapore, Hong Kong, and Vietnam and provide a wide range of trade finance products.

BUSINESS PRODUCTS & SERVICES

  • Letter of Credit (Import/Export)
  • Shipping Guarantee
  • Trust Receipt
  • Foreign / Domestic Bill of Exchange
  • Bank Guarantee
  • Bill for Collection (Inward/Outward)
  • Standby Letter of Credit
  • Invoice Financing
